tag_list: video-production, corporate-video, promotional-video, company-video-production, marketing-videos, video-production-services, business-video-production, video-production-melbourne
overview:
Visual Contact is a Melbourne based video production business specializing in corporate videos, promotional videos and web videos.

Keeping your communication objectives in mind, we work with you to develop your ideas into the most effective video possible. Our focus is on connecting audiences to your message in a way that inspires them to think, understand and take action.

We are committed to producing creative, engaging & high impact work.
